availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Landon Sneed (Franklin County, Kentucky farmer and clerk)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer and clerk. Native of Kentucky. Married to Mary Ann Clarke Sneed. Father of Lewis Sneed and Mary Sneed. Farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Employed as clerk of the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort, Kentucky, from 1859 to 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 60A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 260
Find A Grave, "Name (Birth-Death)," Memorial #63969252, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/63969252 (accessed February 8, 2019).
